headline: Presentamos el registrador de Cloudflare: El registro de dominio que le va a encantar
keywords: Semana de cumpleaños, Noticias de productos, Registrador, Español
description: «I love my domain registrar». Has anyone ever said this? Even before Cloudflare was launched in September 2010, our first beta customers literally begged us: "Will you also launch a recorder?" Today we are doing just that: launching the first registrar that we expect you to say that you love it.
